title: Logs generated in Gazebo versions prior to 1.8 not compatiable with 1.8

content.raw:
The world section of logs generated in versions prior to 1.8 is different from 1.8 expects, leading to meshes not loading/loading incorrectly.  The simple work around I found was to generate a log while using 1.8, copy the <world name=>...</world> section and use it to replace the <world> section in the older log.  

This is purely a graphical issue, and the actual playback of the robot motions are fine.
content.html:
The world section of logs generated in versions prior to 1.8 is different from 1.8 expects, leading to meshes not loading/loading incorrectly. The simple work around I found was to generate a log while using 1.8, copy the <world name=>...</world> section and use it to replace the <world> section in the older log.

This is purely a graphical issue, and the actual playback of the robot motions are fine.
